title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.19 - Photo finish cameras
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.19 - Photo finish cameras

State Regulations

Racing associations shall install at the finish lines
at their tracks and shall adequately maintain two photo finish cameras, to be
approved by the commission, holding one such camera in reserve for emergencies, to automatically photograph the finish of races. The official photographer
shall furnish promptly to the steward of the commission two prints of every
photo finish, and the steward shall keep a permanent file of all such prints
and the negatives or digital images thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
